JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
The Project

We are looking for an electrician to support us in the building of Køge University Hospital. As Electrician you will be working on a range of tasks and truly take part in an extensive project.

The job will include duties such as

What we are looking for:

  • Install, maintain, and repair electrical wiring, systems, and fixtures in buildings and other structures.
  • Plan layout and installation of electrical wiring, equipment, and fixtures based on job specifications and local codes.
  • Troubleshoot and diagnose electrical issues, ensuring prompt and accurate solutions.
  • Test electrical systems and continuity of circuits in electrical wiring, equipment, and fixtures, using testing devices such as ohmmeters, voltmeters, and oscilloscopes.
  • Perform preventive maintenance and safety inspections of electrical systems to ensure functionality and code compliance.
  • Install circuit breakers, transformers, electrical panels, and other electrical components.
  • Work from blueprints, drawings, and electrical diagrams.

An electrician to join us with these characteristics:

  • Licensed electrician
  • Proven experience in electrical installations, repairs, and maintenance within the construction industry.
  •  In-depth knowledge of electrical systems, tools, and safety protocols.

Qualifications:

  • Work experience as an electrician

 What we offer:

  • Insight into a multicultural and multilingual Company;
  • Salary according to the current collective agreement;

If you think you have the right skills to be part of this great project in an exciting international environment, please do not hesitate to send us your application.

About Køge Hospital Project Team I/S (KHPT):


KHPT is a joint venture between Itinera and CMB, two Italian companies with experience in building hospitals.

The Køge Hospital Project is an expansion of the already existing University Hospital in Køge, which will include a complete renovation. When the renovation is complete, it will open to extended special departments, along with new departments for research, which will gather Zealand University Hospital under one single roof. When the work is finished the hospital will be 195.000 sq.m.

The Project

We are looking for an electrician to support us in the building of Køge University Hospital. As Electrician you will be working on a range of tasks and truly take part in an extensive project.

The job will include duties such as

What we are looking for:

  • Test electrical systems and continuity of circuits in electrical wiring, equipment, and fixtures, using testing devices such as ohmmeters, voltmeters, and oscilloscopes.
  • Perform preventive maintenance and safety inspections of electrical systems to ensure functionality and code compliance.
  • Install circuit breakers, transformers, electrical panels, and other electrical components.

An electrician to join us with these characteristics:

  • Proven experience in electrical installations, repairs, and maintenance within the construction industry.
  •  In-depth knowledge of electrical systems, tools, and safety protocols.

Qualifications:

 What we offer:

  • Insight into a multicultural and multilingual Company;
  • Salary according to the current collective agreement;

If you think you have the right skills to be part of this great project in an exciting international environment, please do not hesitate to send us your application.

About Køge Hospital Project Team I/S (KHPT):


KHPT is a joint venture between Itinera and CMB, two Italian companies with experience in building hospitals.

When the renovation is complete, it will open to extended special departments, along with new departments for research, which will gather Zealand University Hospital under one single roof.
